verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, Get thee <S%H3212>out<s%> of thy <S%H776>country<s%>, and from thy <S%H4138>kindred<s%>, and from thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, unto a <S%H776>land<s%> that I will <S%H7200>shew<s%> thee:

And I will make of <S%H6213>thee<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H1431>make<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>; and thou shalt be a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>:

And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them that <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H779>curse<s%> him that <S%H7043>curseth<s%> thee: and in thee shall all <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.

So <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto him; and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with him: and <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H7657%H8141>seventy<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H2771>Haran<s%>.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, and all their <S%H7399>substance<s%> that they had <S%H7408>gathered<s%>, and the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that they had <S%H6213>gotten<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran<s%>; and they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; and into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%>.

¶ And <S%H87>Abram<s%> passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H7927>Sichem<s%>, unto the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh<s%>. And the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>: and there <S%H1129>builded<s%> he an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, who <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him.

And he <S%H6275>removed<s%> from thence unto a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%>, having <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and <S%H5857>Hai<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%>: and there he <S%H1129>builded<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, going <S%H1980>on<s%> <S%H5265>still<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south<s%>.

¶ And there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: and <S%H87>Abram<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> there; for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>grievous<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> he was come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou art a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> to look <S%H4758>upon<s%>:

Therefore it shall come to pass, when the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> thee, that they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, This is his <S%H802>wife<s%>: and they will <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, but they will save thee <S%H2421>alive<s%>.

<S%H559>Say<s%>, I pray <S%H4994>thee<s%>, thou art my <S%H269>sister<s%>: <S%H4616>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with me for thy sake; and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> because of <S%H1558>thee<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, that, when <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> that she was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>fair<s%>.

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> also of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, and <S%H1984>commended<s%> her <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And he <S%H3190>entreated<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> for her sake: and he had <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and he <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and <S%H8198>maidservants<s%>, and she <S%H860>asses<s%>, and <S%H1581>camels<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5061>plagues<s%> because <S%H1697>of<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What is this that thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto me? why didst thou not <S%H5046>tell<s%> me that she was thy <S%H802>wife<s%>?

Why saidst <S%H559>thou<s%>, She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>? so I might have <S%H3947>taken<s%> her to me to <S%H802>wife<s%>: now therefore behold thy <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> her, and go thy <S%H3212>way<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H582>men<s%> concerning him: and they sent him <S%H7971>away<s%>, and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and all that he had.
